reviews.text: I had a great dining experience at this restaurant! The pork stomach chicken hotpot was rich and flavorful, perfect for a comforting meal. The grilled stingray was aromatic and well-seasoned, definitely a must-try. I was also impressed by how fresh the stir-fried dishes were — you can really taste the quality of the ingredients. On top of that, the service was excellent. The staff were friendly, attentive, and made us feel very welcome. Overall, a wonderful place to enjoy a satisfying meal with great food and service. I’ll definitely be coming back again with friends and family!

Is nestled in the vibrant Punggol East Container Park, this alfresco dining spot is really perfect place to kick back, relax, and dive into some seriously delicious Chinese cuisine.

They have from sizzling grilled skewers to comforting hotpot and mouth-watering stir-fried dishes.

We got the Clams with Pig Stomach Hot Pot Soup – it’s a bowl of pure comfort. The broth is so rich and flavorful, it’s like a warm hug for your soul. Pair it with fresh ingredients and you've got a meal that’ll make you feel all cozy inside.

The broccoli and scallop dish are just as impressive.

We also got the sambal stingray which a pity is on the bone side so not much meat.

Btw, the service is top-notch! The staff is super friendly and attentive, making sure you’re having a great time throughout your meal. Plus, it’s a super kid-friendly spot, perfect to bring the whole family along.

Super satisfying. We had the pig stomach soup and is able to customise the pepper so our kids can enjoy with us. The tiger prawn is really delicious. The broccoli is cook in the right temperature and the scallop was fresh.

Loved our dining experience at 不饿不坐! The coconut chicken soup was a unique and delicious surprise, and the sambal stingray was perfectly grilled with just the right spice. Also enjoyed the tiger prawn, pork belly, veggies, lobster balls, and scallop broccoli—all fresh and flavorful.

Great alfresco ambiance and pet-friendly spot! Highly recommend and will be back!☺️

Excellent cuisine here! We loved the food tremendously, especially the pig stomach and chicken hotpot, and the BBQ stingray. Don’t miss their skewers — it’s china style and tastes really authentic, like what I’ve had on my travels to China. Portions are also very good.

Apart from the food, service was impeccable, and they cater very well to young children as well.
They have kids’ cutlery and high chairs here, so parents need not worry.

Overall, highly recommended !
